name: Super Flappy Bee Paint
description:
Flappy Float Along Game ! Avoid everything except the flowers !

Press the Space bar to fly or touch the screen.

Press 'P' or the lower button to Pause the Game.

*Highscores

*Fun Gameplay

*Handmade Graphics

*(This game was made in a couple days by medwards art  for the
'So Bad it's Good' Jam 2020 - https://itch.io/jam/sbigjam2020 )
